name: Findings and purpose
text: [§397-2]  Findings and purpose.  The legislature finds that the Hawaii occupational safety and health law does not adequately provide for the safe operation and use of boilers, pressure systems, amusement rides, and elevators and kindred equipment.  The purpose of this law is to assure the safe operation and use of such apparatus in Hawaii. [L 1980, c 19, pt of §1]
